description: A stylesheet defining CSS variables for theming and styles for a React application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class styling with background and text colors based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling of the app with responsive design.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling in the app with a theme color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with additional styles.
